body:
Instead of using Promise try to use Observable, replace:

get(): Promise {
  return this.http.get(this.serverUrl)
               .map(response => response.json())
}

with

get(): Observable<any> {
  return this.http.get(this.serverUrl)
               .map(response => response.json())
}
title: error TS2314: Generic type 'Promise<T>' requires 1 type argument(s)
